description:
Here’s a tested and proven step-by-step guide for an in-place upgrade on your existing openSUSE Leap 15.5 system to Leap 15.6.

The post How to Upgrade to openSUSE Leap 15.6 from Leap 15.5 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Upgrade to openSUSE Leap 15.6 from Leap 15.5

description:
The Cinnamon 6.2 desktop environment arrives with new applets, streamlined cloud access, and tightened security for unverified Flatpaks.

The post Cinnamon 6.2 Desktop Environment Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Cinnamon 6.2 Desktop Environment Released, Here’s What’s New

description:
Well, the wait is finally over, and the App Store now supports the installation of externally downloaded DEB packages. Of course, since this is not App Center’s default behavior, users will still need to right-click on a DEB package and choose to open it with the App Center application.

The post Ubuntu’s App Center Now Finally Supports Installation of Local DEB Packages appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Ubuntu’s App Center Now Finally Supports Installation of Local DEB Packages

description:
KDE Plasma 6.1 desktop environment is here as a game-changer for all NVIDIA users, bringing Explicit Sync and Triple Buffering support.

The post KDE Plasma 6.1 Desktop Environment Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: KDE Plasma 6.1 Desktop Environment Released, Here’s What’s New
